meanings.definition: An expression of opinions or explanations about an event or situation.
meanings.sent1: The sports commentator provided insightful commentary on the game.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy listening to political commentary on the radio.
meanings.sent3: The cat's commentary on the new dog in the house was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her commentary on life was like a beacon of wisdom in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's commentary on the student's essay was detailed and helpful.

meanings.definition: A series of comments or annotations on a text or piece of work.
meanings.sent1: The DVD included audio commentary by the director.
meanings.sent2: I always read the commentary in the margins of my favorite novel.
meanings.sent3: The commentary on the painting added a touch of humor to the museum tour.
meanings.sent4: Her commentary on the project was like a roadmap to success.
meanings.sent5: The expert's commentary on the ancient manuscript shed new light on its meaning.
